Industry.label: Industry
Industry.value: Radio And Television Broadcasting And Communications Equipment

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Ondas Holdings Inc designs, develops, manufactures, sells, and supports FullMAX Software Defined Radio (SDR) technology in the United States, Israel, and India. Its FullMAX system of wireless base stations, fixed and mobile remote radios are deployed by customers to create wide-area wireless broadband cellular networks. The company markets and sells its products to companies in the electric utilities, water and wastewater utilities, oil and gas producers, and for other critical infrastructure applications in areas such as homeland security and defense, and transportation.
